Explore key health and demographic insights from the 2018 Kenya Demographic Health Survey, covering respondents aged 15–49. I have simplified a large dataset by selecting essential columns and renaming variables for clarity. The refined data is now clear and ready for analysis, with numbers turned into meaningful text.

Discover what the data reveals about Kenya’s health landscape—dive in today!
